
{{alias}}( x )
    Compute the hyperbolic tangent of a number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    y: double
        Hyperbolic tangent (in radians)

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    0.0
    > var v = {{alias}}( -0.0 )
    -0.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 2.0 )
    ~0.964
    > v = {{alias}}( -2.0 )
    ~-0.964
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
